title: [SOLVED]macbooks that work 100% but dont chime
message:
this problem is not specific to any one job but after a few jobs, including my personal 2013 a1466 the macbook doesnt chime when starting
ive found this on 2013, 2014 and 2015 macbooks, its not really a problem because i can tell when its on when the lcd turns on
my question is, what makes the chime and why would it not chime after water damage repair

title: [SOLVED]macbooks that work 100% but dont chime
message: Did you PRAM reset these laptops ?

title: [SOLVED]macbooks that work 100% but dont chime
message: Volume turned down is OSX. PRAM reset will clear that.

title: [SOLVED]macbooks that work 100% but dont chime
message: done thanks, i feel stupid now
